name: Marcin Dziubinski
content: Home page of Marcin DziubiÅski Marcin DziubiÅski Institute of Informatics Faculty of Mathematics, Informatics and Mechanics University of Warsaw tel: +48 22 5544458 m.dziubinski@mimuw.edu.pl I am associate professor at Institute of Informatics, Warsaw University. My research interests lie at the interface of computer science and economics and include social and economic networks, mechanism design and game theory. My CV is available here. Publications Game Theory, Economics, and Computation How to hide in a network.
